nav.pluginDashboard: Sidebar header label for the main plugin view
nav.installed: Sidebar section header — groups installed plugins
nav.plugins: Generic noun — the word 'plugins' used in headings
nav.extensions: Sidebar section header — groups host extensions
nav.addPlugins: Sidebar button label — navigates to marketplace
nav.settings: Sidebar button label — navigates to settings

action.saving: Button label — in-progress state while saving
action.remove: Button/menu label — delete a plugin or extension
action.start: Button label — start a stopped plugin container
action.stop: Button label — stop a running plugin container
action.restart: Button label — restart a plugin container
action.enable: Button label — enable a disabled extension
action.disable: Button label — disable an enabled extension
action.refresh: Button label — reload data from server
action.refreshing: Button label — in-progress state while refreshing
action.continue: Button label — proceed to next step in a wizard
action.back: Button label — go to previous step in a wizard
action.install: Button label — install a plugin or extension
action.installing: Button label — in-progress state while installing
action.retry: Button label — retry a failed action
action.confirm: Button label — confirm a destructive or important action
action.deny: Button label — reject a permission request
action.dismiss: Button label — dismiss a notification or alert
action.copy: Button tooltip — copy text to clipboard
action.copyToClipboard: Aria label — copy button for screen readers
action.checking: Inline status text — checking something in progress

status.error: Badge/indicator — plugin is in error state
status.enabled: Badge/indicator — extension is enabled and running
status.disabled: Badge/indicator — extension is installed but not running
status.local: Badge — plugin was installed from local manifest, not marketplace
status.registry: Badge — plugin came from a registry
status.dev: Badge — plugin is in developer mode (uppercase abbreviation)
status.deprecated: Badge — package is deprecated in the registry
status.official: Badge — package is from the official publisher
status.builtIn: Badge — feature is built into the app
status.soon: Badge — feature is coming soon (uppercase label)
status.deferred: Badge — permission was deferred to runtime (uppercase label)
status.unrestricted: Badge — permission has no restrictions (uppercase label)
status.notSpecified: Fallback text — value was not provided
status.none: Fallback text — empty state, no items

empty.noPlugins: Empty state heading — no plugins installed yet
empty.selectPlugin: Empty state heading — no plugin selected in sidebar
empty.noPluginsHint: Empty state body — instructions to get started
empty.selectPluginHint: Empty state body — instructions to select a plugin

notification.engineNotFound: Warning banner — container engine (Docker) not installed
notification.engineNotRunning: Warning banner — container engine installed but not running
notification.updateAvailable: Info banner — app update available. {{version}} is semver string
notification.pluginInstalled: Toast notification — plugin installed from marketplace
notification.pluginInstalledLocal: Toast notification — plugin installed from local manifest
notification.pluginRebuilt: Toast notification — plugin rebuilt from source
notification.extensionInstalled: Toast notification — extension installed. {{name}} is display name
notification.extensionInstalledLocal: Toast notification — extension installed from local files
notification.devModeEnabled: Toast notification — dev mode turned on for a plugin
notification.devModeDisabled: Toast notification — dev mode turned off
notification.updatedTo: Toast notification — package updated. {{name}} is display name, {{version}} is new version
notification.updatedToKeyChange: Toast notification — updated with signing key change accepted

error.loadPlugins: Error toast — failed to fetch plugin list. {{error}} is the error message
error.loadExtensions: Error toast — failed to fetch extension list
error.loadMarketplace: Error toast — failed to load marketplace data
error.loadExtensionMarketplace: Error toast — failed to load extension marketplace
error.startFailed: Error toast — plugin failed to start
error.stopFailed: Error toast — plugin failed to stop
error.localInstallFailed: Error toast — local manifest install failed
error.rebuildFailed: Error toast — dev mode rebuild failed
error.readManifest: Error toast — couldn't read local manifest file
error.fetchManifest: Error toast — couldn't fetch remote manifest
error.fetchExtensionManifest: Error toast — couldn't fetch extension manifest
error.enableFailed: Error toast — extension failed to enable
error.disableFailed: Error toast — extension failed to disable
error.extensionSearchFailed: Error toast — extension marketplace search failed
error.dismissFailed: Error toast — failed to dismiss a notification
error.devModeToggleFailed: Error toast — dev mode toggle failed
error.logsFailed: Error toast — failed to retrieve container logs
error.engineCheckFailed: Error toast — container engine status check failed

confirm.removePlugin: Confirmation dialog title — about to remove a plugin. {{name}} is plugin display name
confirm.removePluginDesc: Confirmation dialog body — warns about permanent data deletion
confirm.removeAndDeleteData: Destructive button label — confirms plugin removal with data deletion
confirm.removeExtension: Confirmation dialog title — about to remove an extension. {{name}} is extension name
confirm.removeExtensionNoConsumers: Confirmation dialog body — no plugins depend on this extension
confirm.removeExtensionConsumers_one: Confirmation dialog body — one plugin depends on this extension (singular)
confirm.removeExtensionConsumers_other: Confirmation dialog body — multiple plugins depend on this extension. {{count}} is number
confirm.removeExtensionAction: Destructive button label — confirms extension removal

time.justNow: Relative time label — less than a minute ago

by: Preposition — 'by' as in 'by author-name', used next to plugin author attribution
